intro: Columnea schiedeana, commonly known as the scarlet jewel or red-flowered columnea, is a tropical flowering plant native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its striking, tubular red or orange flowers that bloom in clusters along the stems. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves with a glossy texture and a slightly serrated margin. It thrives in humid, shady environments and is often cultivated as a ornamental plant for its vibrant blooms. Columnea schiedeana is a member of the Gesneriaceae family, known for its showy and diverse flowering species.
